channel.description: Recent content in intro on Pilvilinna

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Let’s get started! This blog is here to document what happens with our new Cloud Castle, the apartment we bought in a place called Cloud Castle in an 100+ year Mental Institute.

item.title: Networking
item.description: Networking – let’s think about cables first. In our current apartment we have ethernet wall plates around the apartment but as this has been built 10+ years ago, the cabling is probably Cat5e or so as it cannot handle anything above 1 GbiT/s that well.
